title: Williams-Sonoma Opens New Store At The Commons At Calabasas
text:
Williams-Sonoma Opens New Store At The Commons At Calabasas 
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Williams-Sonoma opens tomorrow at The Commons at Calabasas with a fresh design including new cooktop for demos as well as curated indoor and outdoor Williams-Sonoma Home vignettes that will debut for the first time at the location. Williams-Sonoma is a leading source for cookware and home furnishings in Southern California. Calabasas joins the Beverly Hills store, which integrated a showroom in July, and South Coast Plaza, in prominently featuring Williams-Sonoma Home. This Saturday at 10am, Williams-Sonoma hosts matriarch of the Kardashian-Jenner family and Calabasas resident, Kris Jenner, for an in-store event. Jenner will be signing her cookbook, In The Kitchen With Kris. Books may be pre-purchased at http://www.williams-sonoma.com/pages/store-events/store-events/book-signing.html . The brand is donating a portion of book sales to the charity No Kid Hungry. 
Williams-Sonoma President, Janet Hayes remarks, “We’re thrilled to return to The Commons at Calabasas where the sense of community is so strong. We look forward to serving our customers here again and welcome them back to our store with a whole new look.” The retailer closed earlier this year when the lease came to term. Williams-Sonoma, after receiving dozens of letters from loyal fans expressing their desire for the retailer to return, was able to secure its original anchor position at the shopping center and introduce a newly designed store. 
Williams-Sonoma’s location at The Commons at Calabasas features over 5,000 square feet and includes an eight-seat cooking island that will hold culinary classes for both adults and children. An outdoor area with landscaping and Williams-Sonoma Home outdoor furniture will also be new to the store. For information on in-store promotions and events, Calabasas residents are encouraged to like the store page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WilliamsSonomaCalabasas . The store is located at 4776 Commons Way. Property hours are Monday-Thursday 10am-8pm, Friday-Saturday 10am-9pm and, Sunday 11am-7pm. For more information on the store, ticket information and opening event schedule, visit www.williams-sonoma.com or call 818-591-5940. 
About Williams-Sonoma 
Since its founding by Chuck Williams in 1956, the Williams-Sonoma brand has been bringing people together around food. A member of Williams-Sonoma, Inc. (NYSE:WSM) portfolio of brands, Williams-Sonoma is a leading specialty retailer of high-quality products for the kitchen and home, providing world-class service and an engaging customer experience. Products include cookware, cooks’ tools, cutlery, electrics, bakeware, food, tabletop and bar, outdoor, cookbooks, as well as furniture, lighting and decorative accessories. Each store has a professional demonstration kitchen for cooking classes and tastings conducted by expert culinary staff. Williams-Sonoma Cooking Schools, located in select locations in the U.S. and Australia, offer hands-on classes led by professional chefs. A comprehensive gift registry program for weddings and other special events is available in stores and online. On williams-sonoma.com and the Williams-Sonoma blog, Taste , customers can find recipes; tips and techniques that help them create delicious meals and wonderful memories. 
About The Commons at Calabasas 
The Commons at Calabasas is a stunning crescent of high-end retail stores, restaurants and entertainment choices set against the gentle hillsides of Calabasas.
